mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_name, ci.company_code, title, end_date, position_code, r.headcount, employment_type, work_day, work_time, work_place, sal_type, sal, career_condition, years, education_base_code, content FROM recruit r LEFT JOIN companyinfo ci ON r.company_code = ci.company_code WHERE recruit_num = #{recruitNum}

SELECT company_name as name, company_code as code from companyinfo
and company_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY company_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit ( RECRUIT_NUM, COMPANY_CODE, POSITION_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, HEADCOUNT, END_DATE, EMPLOYMENT_TYPE, WORK_DAY, WORK_TIME, WORK_PLACE, SAL_TYPE, SAL, CAREER_CONDITION, YEARS, EDUCATION_BASE_CODE ) VALUES ( recruit_seq.NEXTVAL, #{companyCode}, #{position}, #{title}, #{content}, #{headcount}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{workType}, #{workDay}, #{workStartTime} || '~' || #{workEndTime}, #{workPlace}, #{salaryType}, #{salary}, #{careerStandard}, #{careerYears}, #{eduStandard} )
mapper.update: UPDATE recruit SET COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode}, POSITION_CODE = #{position}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, HEADCOUNT = #{headcount}, END_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), EMPLOYMENT_TYPE = #{workType}, WORK_DAY = #{workDay}, WORK_TIME = #{workStartTime} || '~' || #{workEndTime}, WORK_PLACE = #{workPlace}, SAL_TYPE = #{salaryType}, SAL = #{salary}, CAREER_CONDITION = #{careerStandard}, YEARS = #{careerYears}, EDUCATION_BASE_CODE = #{eduStandard} WHERE RECRUIT_NUM = #{id}
update recruit set delete_flag = 'T' where recruit_num = #{recruitNum}
